name: inter-ui
description: Font files for the Inter font family.
author: Rasmus Andersson (https://rsms.me)

scripts.copy: cp -a './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/' './Inter (web hinted)/' && cp -a './temp/Inter Web/' './Inter (web)/'
scripts.subset: npm run subset-hinted & npm run subset-unhinted && npm run subset-cleanup
scripts.subset-unhinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Web/*.woff2' --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff                    && find './temp/Inter Web/' -type f -name '*subset.woff**' -exec cp {} './Inter (web latin)/' ';'                            && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web latin)/'*.woff*
scripts.subset-hinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/*.woff2' --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff && find './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/' -type f -name '*subset.woff**' -exec cp {} './Inter (web hinted latin)/' ';'  && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web hinted latin)/'*.woff*
scripts.subset-cleanup: rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter.var.woff' && rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter-italic.var.woff' && rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter-roman.var.woff'
